languages.text: "Очень любезно с вашей стороны предупредить меня заранее, господин Версериан. Я запомню ваши слова".
"How courteous of you to warn me, Master Werserian. I will remember your words."
languages.original_text: "Очень любезно с вашей стороны предупредить меня заранее, господин Версериан. Я запомню ваши слова".

traits.locale_text: "How very nice of you to warn me in advance, sir Werserian. I will remember your words."
"How very nice of you to warn me in advance, sir Werserian. I will remember your words."
"How very nice of you to warn me in advance, Sir Werserian! I will kindly remember your words."
"How very nice of you to warn me in advance, Sir Werserian! I will kindly remember your words."
"How courteous of you to warn me, Master Werserian. I will remember your words."
"How courteous of you to warn me, Master Werserian. I will remember your words."

languages.text: « C'est bien aimable de me prévenir, maître Werserian. J'en prends bonne note. »
languages.original_text: "How courteous of you to warn me, Master Werserian. I will remember your words."

traits.locale_text: « C'est bien aimable de me prévenir, maître Werserian. J'en prends bonne note. »

languages.text: «La advertencia es muy cortés por su parte, maestro Werserian. Recordaré sus palabras».
languages.original_text: "How courteous of you to warn me, Master Werserian. I will remember your words."

traits.locale_text: «¡Gracias por advertirme con antelación, señor Werserian! Recordaré sus amables palabras».

languages.text: “感谢你的提醒，韦尔森大师。我会将你的话铭记在心。”
languages.original_text: "How courteous of you to warn me, Master Werserian. I will remember your words."

traits.locale_text: “你能事先提醒我，实在是太好了，韦尔森大师！我会好好记住你的话。”

languages.text: "Wie gütig von Euch, mich im Voraus zu warnen, Meister Werserian. Ich werde mich an Eure Worte erinnern."
languages.original_text: "How courteous of you to warn me, Master Werserian. I will remember your words."

traits.locale_text: "Wie gütig von Euch, mich im Voraus zu warnen, Sir Werserian! Ich werde mich an Eure Worte erinnern."

languages.text: 「事前の忠告、感謝しよう、マスター・ウェルザリアン！その言葉、覚えておこう」
languages.original_text: "How courteous of you to warn me, Master Werserian. I will remember your words."

traits.locale_text: 「事前の忠告、感謝しよう、マスター・ウェルザリアン！その言葉、覚えておこう」

languages.text: "Beni uyarmakla nezaket gösterdin Üstat Werserian. Sözlerini aklıma kazıyacağım."
languages.original_text: "How courteous of you to warn me, Master Werserian. I will remember your words."
